title: Oscar and Lucinda
description:
This is an alternative cover edition for ISBN 9780571153046Peter Carey's Booker Prize winning novel imagines Australia's youth, before its dynamic passions became dangerous habits. It is also a startling and unusual love story. Oscar is a young English clergyman who has broken with his past and developed a disturbing talent for gambling. A country girl of singular ambition, Lucinda moves to Sydney, driven by dreams of self-reliance and the building of an industrial Utopia. Together this unlikely pair create and are created by the spectacle of mid-nineteenth century Australia. Peter Carey's visionary brilliance, and his capacity to delight and surprise, propel this story to its stunning conclusion.Daring, original, intense and bizarre, 
Oscar and Lucinda
 is a brilliant achievement - a moving love story and an historical tour de force that is also powerfully contemporary.
author: Peter Carey
